item.title: References
item.description: References # Chandrasekhar, S. (1960). Radiative transfer. Dover Publications Inc. # Nicodemus, F. E. (1965). Directional reﬂectance and emissivity of an opaque surface. Appl. Opt., 4(7):767–775. # Cook, R. L. and Torrance, K. E. (1982). A reﬂectance model for computer graphics. ACM Trans. Graph., 1(1):7–24. # Kajiya, J. T. (1986). The rendering equation. SIGGRAPH Comput. Graph., 20(4):143–150. # Cercignani, C. (1988). The Boltzmann Equation and Its Applications.
